textView.content: All it wanted was to be big and full of air. Float away and see the world.
In it plastic wrapping the balloon waited and waited for someone to find him and fill him with air.
On day a boy wanted to buy a balloon.
He went through all the colours and shapes and chose one. The little red balloon
The boy blew in the balloon as hard as he could and the little red balloon grew bigger and bigger.
The boy managed to fill until it was three times its original size.
The boy closed the balloon by tying the opening shut. A gust of wind however blew the balloon out of his hand and the little red balloon went his own way
The balloon flew over houses, trees and things he had never seen before. Elation filled him as he felt something he had never felt before, freedom.
